Class javachart.chart.LabelAxis

Class javachart.chart.LabelAxis 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----javachart.chart.Axis
           |
           +----javachart.chart.LabelAxis
public class LabelAxis
extends Axis
implements AxisInterface
An Axis that draws labels at regular intervals. If labels are undefined this class uses labels from the first Dataset in its Dataset array. If these are undefined, it uses the index of the missing label. Label axes are particularly useful for various kinds of Bar and Column charts.

addLabel(String)
Adds a label to this Axis
addLabels(String[])
Appends an array of labels to this Axis
deleteLabel(int)
Deletes a label from this Axis at the specified location.
getLabel(double, int)
Overrides Axis to return user-defined labels
replaceLabels(String[])
Replaces all labels on this Axis
scale()
Overrides Axis to scale for Labels
whereOnAxis(int, int)
Overrides Axis to place user-defined label strings

addLabel 
  public synchronized void addLabel(String str)
Adds a label to this Axis
Parameters:
str - additional label String
deleteLabel 
  public synchronized void deleteLabel(int which)
Deletes a label from this Axis at the specified location. The list of labels adjusted, leaving no "holes" in the list. Subsequent labels in the list have their position decremented by 1
Parameters:
which - Label to delete
